Uses of Class
org.apache.hadoop.tools.DistCpContext

  • Packages that use DistCpContext 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.tools
    DistCp is a tool for replicating data using MapReduce jobs for concurrent copy operations.
    org.apache.hadoop.tools.util
